strapiPost.title: Downtown Bentonville Inc., DWTN Media Win Gold & Bronze At Telly Awards
strapiPost.content:
Downtown Bentonville Incorporated and its digital storytelling platform DWTN Media won gold and bronze recognition at the 43rd Annual Telly Awards. 

  • Local winners: The Lighting of the Square in Downtown Bentonville received gold recognition in the Best Promotional General-Events category. DWTN Now received the bronze recognition as Best Television - Charitable/Not-for-profit & Cause Marketing for its Fly Oz TV episode. 
  • The awards: The Telly Awards honors excellence in video and television across all screens and is judged by leaders from platforms like Adobe, Netflix, Dow Jones, Nickelodeon, and many more. 

View the complete list of winners HERE.
